ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] bracer of the hidden
ygData.msgSnippet: ***snickers*** PT Barnam - There s a sucker born every minute  (well actually he DIDN T say that but it s still true) No, odds are you ll never need this.
ygData.messageBody:
***snickers***

PT Barnam - "There's a sucker born every minute" (well actually he DIDN'T
say that but it's still true)

No, odds are you'll never need this. We have a song for see invis and I
would have to say that I RARELY need it. The only time I NEED to see invis
I'm usually using my own song or a caster in the group casts it on me.

I would say you got amazingly lucky. A lot of people don't realize just how
useless see invis is other than travelling in a group that's invisible.
Nice... but not needed.

Lol see if that mage will buy an infravision item for 2000 ;) hehehe

Lyrnia
----- Original Message -----
From: "Bill Costlow" <atlatyl@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 6:36 AM
Subject: [eqbards] bracer of the hidden


> Won a lotto item from inside the Sarnak castle on the
> Lake...
>
> Bracer of the Hidden, AC 6, all, all
> effect: see invisible
>
> Rare drop off sarnak legos.
>
> I was drowned in tells starting at 500 pp.
> I sold it for 2K to a 54th lvl magician for the
> "convenience" of being able to see his air pet.
>
> Honestly I had no idea anyone would pay that much for
> it...I would have been overjoyed with 200.
>
> My question is this: Am I really goig to need this
> THAT much at higher lvl?
>
>
